definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: The microfilament in the microvilli and pseudopodia is the motion skeleton of cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: 微绒毛及伪足内的微丝是瘤细胞的运动骨架。

sentences.english: Microfilaments also mediated the interaction between midbody and plasma membrane.
sentences.chinese: 中体和质膜间的相互作用依赖微丝介导。

sentences.english: The microfilaments of some microvilli formed core rootlets and entered into the cytoplasm.
sentences.chinese: 细胞游离面部分微绒毛的微丝形成中心根并深入胞质。

sentences.english: Microfilaments and microtubules are responsible for almost all major cytoplasmic movements.
sentences.chinese: 绝大部分细胞质运动由微丝和微管完成。

sentences.english: When ATP is added, the myosin motors move the actin filaments.
sentences.chinese: 加入ATP后，肌球蛋白马达使微丝移动。

sentences.english: Microsfilaments and microtubules are responsible for almost all major cytoplasmic movements.
sentences.chinese: 微丝和微管主要负责大多数细胞质移动。

sentences.english: The microfilaments in the microvilli and pseudopodia are the skeleton of the movement.
sentences.chinese: 微绒毛及伪足内的微丝是其运动的骨架结构。

sentences.english: The microfilament is the skeletal structure of microvilli.
sentences.chinese: 微绒毛活动的支撑骨架为微丝。

sentences.english: These medicines clear microfilariae from the bloodstream and kill most of the adult worms.
sentences.chinese: 这些药物的作用是清除血液中的微丝蚴和杀死成虫。

sentences.english: Main Outcome Measures The wound areas and the arrangement of microfilament cytoskeleton of wounds.
sentences.chinese: 主要指标伤口面积及细胞微丝骨架的排列。
